name: Twin Dimensions
description:
Play as a wizard with the power of swiching dimension.

Defeat the "Shadows" to save the world!

  • In the Dark Dimension,  you can see the "Shadows" and fight them.
  • In the Light Dimension, you can find potions for health and mana.

----------------------------------

How to Play:

WASD = Move

Left Shift = Run

Left Click = Fire Magic Fireball

E = Switch Dimension

Escape Key = Pause the game

-----------------------------------

Game made in 6 days for the JTA Game Jam #5. 

Music by Audiorezout.
